00077 /* step is limited from 0 (frame start position) to 1 (frame end position) */
00078 void collision_move_object(CollisionModifierData *collmd, float step, float prevstep)
00079 {
00080     float tv[3] = {0, 0, 0};
00081     unsigned int i = 0;
00082 
00083     for ( i = 0; i < collmd->numverts; i++ )
00084     {
00085         sub_v3_v3v3 ( tv, collmd->xnew[i].co, collmd->x[i].co );
00086         VECADDS ( collmd->current_x[i].co, collmd->x[i].co, tv, prevstep );
00087         VECADDS ( collmd->current_xnew[i].co, collmd->x[i].co, tv, step );
00088         sub_v3_v3v3 ( collmd->current_v[i].co, collmd->current_xnew[i].co, collmd->current_x[i].co );
00089     }
00090 
00091     bvhtree_update_from_mvert ( collmd->bvhtree, collmd->mfaces, collmd->numfaces, collmd->current_x, collmd->current_xnew, collmd->numverts, 1 );
00092 }
00093 
00094 BVHTree *bvhtree_build_from_mvert ( MFace *mfaces, unsigned int numfaces, MVert *x, unsigned int UNUSED(numverts), float epsilon )
00095 {
00096     BVHTree *tree;
00097     float co[12];
00098     unsigned int i;
00099     MFace *tface = mfaces;
00100 
00101     tree = BLI_bvhtree_new ( numfaces*2, epsilon, 4, 26 );
00102 
00103     // fill tree
00104     for ( i = 0; i < numfaces; i++, tface++ )
00105     {
00106         copy_v3_v3 ( &co[0*3], x[tface->v1].co );
00107         copy_v3_v3 ( &co[1*3], x[tface->v2].co );
00108         copy_v3_v3 ( &co[2*3], x[tface->v3].co );
00109         if ( tface->v4 )
00110             copy_v3_v3 ( &co[3*3], x[tface->v4].co );
00111 
00112         BLI_bvhtree_insert ( tree, i, co, ( mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3 ) );
00113     }
00114 
00115     // balance tree
00116     BLI_bvhtree_balance ( tree );
00117 
00118     return tree;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void bvhtree_update_from_mvert ( BVHTree * bvhtree, MFace *faces, int numfaces, MVert *x, MVert *xnew, int UNUSED(numverts), int moving )
00122 {
00123     int i;
00124     MFace *mfaces = faces;
00125     float co[12], co_moving[12];
00126     int ret = 0;
00127 
00128     if ( !bvhtree )
00129         return;
00130 
00131     if ( x )
00132     {
00133         for ( i = 0; i < numfaces; i++, mfaces++ )
00134         {
00135             copy_v3_v3 ( &co[0*3], x[mfaces->v1].co );
00136             copy_v3_v3 ( &co[1*3], x[mfaces->v2].co );
00137             copy_v3_v3 ( &co[2*3], x[mfaces->v3].co );
00138             if ( mfaces->v4 )
00139                 copy_v3_v3 ( &co[3*3], x[mfaces->v4].co );
00140 
00141             // copy new locations into array
00142             if ( moving && xnew )
00143             {
00144                 // update moving positions
00145                 copy_v3_v3 ( &co_moving[0*3], xnew[mfaces->v1].co );
00146                 copy_v3_v3 ( &co_moving[1*3], xnew[mfaces->v2].co );
00147                 copy_v3_v3 ( &co_moving[2*3], xnew[mfaces->v3].co );
00148                 if ( mfaces->v4 )
00149                     copy_v3_v3 ( &co_moving[3*3], xnew[mfaces->v4].co );
00150 
00151                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node ( bvhtree, i, co, co_moving, ( mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3 ) );
00152             }
00153             else
00154             {
00155                 ret = BLI_bvhtree_update_node ( bvhtree, i, co, NULL, ( mfaces->v4 ? 4 : 3 ) );
00156             }
00157 
00158             // check if tree is already full
00159             if ( !ret )
00160                 break;
00161         }
00162 
00163         BLI_bvhtree_update_tree ( bvhtree );
00164     }
00165 }

00177 #define mySWAP(a,b) do { double tmp = b ; b = a ; a = tmp ; } while (0)
00178 #if 0 /* UNUSED */
00179 static int 
00180 gsl_poly_solve_cubic (double a, double b, double c, 
00181                       double *x0, double *x1, double *x2)
00182 {
00183     double q = (a * a - 3 * b);
00184     double r = (2 * a * a * a - 9 * a * b + 27 * c);
00185 
00186     double Q = q / 9;
00187     double R = r / 54;
00188 
00189     double Q3 = Q * Q * Q;
00190     double R2 = R * R;
00191 
00192     double CR2 = 729 * r * r;
00193     double CQ3 = 2916 * q * q * q;
00194 
00195     if (R == 0 && Q == 0)
00196     {
00197         *x0 = - a / 3;
00198         *x1 = - a / 3;
00199         *x2 = - a / 3;
00200         return 3;
00201     }
00202     else if (CR2 == CQ3) 
00203     {
00204         /* this test is actually R2 == Q3, written in a form suitable
00205         for exact computation with integers */
00206 
00207         /* Due to finite precision some double roots may be missed, and
00208         considered to be a pair of complex roots z = x +/- epsilon i
00209         close to the real axis. */
00210 
00211         double sqrtQ = sqrt (Q);
00212 
00213         if (R > 0)
00214         {
00215             *x0 = -2 * sqrtQ  - a / 3;
00216             *x1 = sqrtQ - a / 3;
00217             *x2 = sqrtQ - a / 3;
00218         }
00219         else
00220         {
00221             *x0 = - sqrtQ  - a / 3;
00222             *x1 = - sqrtQ - a / 3;
00223             *x2 = 2 * sqrtQ - a / 3;
00224         }
00225         return 3;
00226     }
00227     else if (CR2 < CQ3) /* equivalent to R2 < Q3 */
00228     {
00229         double sqrtQ = sqrt (Q);
00230         double sqrtQ3 = sqrtQ * sqrtQ * sqrtQ;
00231         double theta = acos (R / sqrtQ3);
00232         double norm = -2 * sqrtQ;
00233         *x0 = norm * cos (theta / 3) - a / 3;
00234         *x1 = norm * cos ((theta + 2.0 * M_PI) / 3) - a / 3;
00235         *x2 = norm * cos ((theta - 2.0 * M_PI) / 3) - a / 3;
00236 
00237         /* Sort *x0, *x1, *x2 into increasing order */
00238 
00239         if (*x0 > *x1)
00240             mySWAP(*x0, *x1);
00241 
00242         if (*x1 > *x2)
00243         {
00244             mySWAP(*x1, *x2);
00245 
00246             if (*x0 > *x1)
00247                 mySWAP(*x0, *x1);
00248         }
00249 
00250         return 3;
00251     }
00252     else
00253     {
00254         double sgnR = (R >= 0 ? 1 : -1);
00255         double A = -sgnR * pow (fabs (R) + sqrt (R2 - Q3), 1.0/3.0);
00256         double B = Q / A;
00257         *x0 = A + B - a / 3;
00258         return 1;
00259     }
00260 }

00269 static int 
00270 gsl_poly_solve_quadratic (double a, double b, double c, 
00271                           double *x0, double *x1)
00272 {
00273     double disc = b * b - 4 * a * c;
00274 
00275     if (a == 0) /* Handle linear case */
00276     {
00277         if (b == 0)
00278         {
00279             return 0;
00280         }
00281         else
00282         {
00283             *x0 = -c / b;
00284             return 1;
00285         };
00286     }
00287 
00288     if (disc > 0)
00289     {
00290         if (b == 0)
00291         {
00292             double r = fabs (0.5 * sqrt (disc) / a);
00293             *x0 = -r;
00294             *x1 =  r;
00295         }
00296         else
00297         {
00298             double sgnb = (b > 0 ? 1 : -1);
00299             double temp = -0.5 * (b + sgnb * sqrt (disc));
00300             double r1 = temp / a;
00301             double r2 = c / temp;
00302 
00303             if (r1 < r2) 
00304             {
00305                 *x0 = r1;
00306                 *x1 = r2;
00307             } 
00308             else 
00309             {
00310                 *x0 = r2;
00311                 *x1 = r1;
00312             }
00313         }
00314         return 2;
00315     }
00316     else if (disc == 0) 
00317     {
00318         *x0 = -0.5 * b / a;
00319         *x1 = -0.5 * b / a;
00320         return 2;
00321     }
00322     else
00323     {
00324         return 0;
00325     }
00326 }
00327 #endif /* UNUSED */

00333 *     page 4, left column
00334 */
00335 #if 0
00336 static int cloth_get_collision_time ( double a[3], double b[3], double c[3], double d[3], double e[3], double f[3], double solution[3] )
00337 {
00338     int num_sols = 0;
00339 
00340     // x^0 - checked 
00341     double g =  a[0] * c[1] * e[2] - a[0] * c[2] * e[1] +
00342         a[1] * c[2] * e[0] - a[1] * c[0] * e[2] + 
00343         a[2] * c[0] * e[1] - a[2] * c[1] * e[0];
00344 
00345     // x^1
00346     double h = -b[2] * c[1] * e[0] + b[1] * c[2] * e[0] - a[2] * d[1] * e[0] +
00347         a[1] * d[2] * e[0] + b[2] * c[0] * e[1] - b[0] * c[2] * e[1] +
00348         a[2] * d[0] * e[1] - a[0] * d[2] * e[1] - b[1] * c[0] * e[2] +
00349         b[0] * c[1] * e[2] - a[1] * d[0] * e[2] + a[0] * d[1] * e[2] -
00350         a[2] * c[1] * f[0] + a[1] * c[2] * f[0] + a[2] * c[0] * f[1] -
00351         a[0] * c[2] * f[1] - a[1] * c[0] * f[2] + a[0] * c[1] * f[2];
00352 
00353     // x^2
00354     double i = -b[2] * d[1] * e[0] + b[1] * d[2] * e[0] +
00355         b[2] * d[0] * e[1] - b[0] * d[2] * e[1] -
00356         b[1] * d[0] * e[2] + b[0] * d[1] * e[2] -
00357         b[2] * c[1] * f[0] + b[1] * c[2] * f[0] -
00358         a[2] * d[1] * f[0] + a[1] * d[2] * f[0] +
00359         b[2] * c[0] * f[1] - b[0] * c[2] * f[1] + 
00360         a[2] * d[0] * f[1] - a[0] * d[2] * f[1] -
00361         b[1] * c[0] * f[2] + b[0] * c[1] * f[2] -
00362         a[1] * d[0] * f[2] + a[0] * d[1] * f[2];
00363 
00364     // x^3 - checked
00365     double j = -b[2] * d[1] * f[0] + b[1] * d[2] * f[0] +
00366         b[2] * d[0] * f[1] - b[0] * d[2] * f[1] -
00367         b[1] * d[0] * f[2] + b[0] * d[1] * f[2];
00368 
00369     /*
00370     printf("r1: %lf\n", a[0] * c[1] * e[2] - a[0] * c[2] * e[1]);
00371     printf("r2: %lf\n", a[1] * c[2] * e[0] - a[1] * c[0] * e[2]);
00372     printf("r3: %lf\n", a[2] * c[0] * e[1] - a[2] * c[1] * e[0]);
00373 
00374     printf("x1 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", a[0], a[1], a[2]);
00375     printf("x2 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", c[0], c[1], c[2]);
00376     printf("x3 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", e[0], e[1], e[2]);
00377 
00378     printf("v1 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", b[0], b[1], b[2]);
00379     printf("v2 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", d[0], d[1], d[2]);
00380     printf("v3 x: %f, y: %f, z: %f\n", f[0], f[1], f[2]);
00381 
00382     printf("t^3: %lf, t^2: %lf, t^1: %lf, t^0: %lf\n", j, i, h, g);
00383     
00384 */
00385     // Solve cubic equation to determine times t1, t2, t3, when the collision will occur.
00386     if ( ABS ( j ) > DBL_EPSILON )
00387     {
00388         i /= j;
00389         h /= j;
00390         g /= j;
00391         num_sols = gsl_poly_solve_cubic ( i, h, g, &solution[0], &solution[1], &solution[2] );
00392     }
00393     else
00394     {
00395         num_sols = gsl_poly_solve_quadratic ( i, h, g, &solution[0], &solution[1] );
00396         solution[2] = -1.0;
00397     }
00398 
00399     // printf("num_sols: %d, sol1: %lf, sol2: %lf, sol3: %lf\n", num_sols, solution[0],  solution[1],  solution[2]);
00400 
00401     // Discard negative solutions
00402     if ( ( num_sols >= 1 ) && ( solution[0] < DBL_EPSILON ) )
00403     {
00404         --num_sols;
00405         solution[0] = solution[num_sols];
00406     }
00407     if ( ( num_sols >= 2 ) && ( solution[1] < DBL_EPSILON ) )
00408     {
00409         --num_sols;
00410         solution[1] = solution[num_sols];
00411     }
00412     if ( ( num_sols == 3 ) && ( solution[2] < DBL_EPSILON ) )
00413     {
00414         --num_sols;
00415     }
00416 
00417     // Sort
00418     if ( num_sols == 2 )
00419     {
00420         if ( solution[0] > solution[1] )
00421         {
00422             double tmp = solution[0];
00423             solution[0] = solution[1];
00424             solution[1] = tmp;
00425         }
00426     }
00427     else if ( num_sols == 3 )
00428     {
00429 
00430         // Bubblesort
00431         if ( solution[0] > solution[1] )
00432         {
00433             double tmp = solution[0]; solution[0] = solution[1]; solution[1] = tmp;
00434         }
00435         if ( solution[1] > solution[2] )
00436         {
00437             double tmp = solution[1]; solution[1] = solution[2]; solution[2] = tmp;
00438         }
00439         if ( solution[0] > solution[1] )
00440         {
00441             double tmp = solution[0]; solution[0] = solution[1]; solution[1] = tmp;
00442         }
00443     }
00444 
00445     return num_sols;
00446 }
00447 #endif
