00450 // w3 is not perfect
00451 static void collision_compute_barycentric ( float pv[3], float p1[3], float p2[3], float p3[3], float *w1, float *w2, float *w3 )
00452 {
00453     double  tempV1[3], tempV2[3], tempV4[3];
00454     double  a,b,c,d,e,f;
00455 
00456     VECSUB ( tempV1, p1, p3 );
00457     VECSUB ( tempV2, p2, p3 );
00458     VECSUB ( tempV4, pv, p3 );
00459 
00460     a = INPR ( tempV1, tempV1 );
00461     b = INPR ( tempV1, tempV2 );
00462     c = INPR ( tempV2, tempV2 );
00463     e = INPR ( tempV1, tempV4 );
00464     f = INPR ( tempV2, tempV4 );
00465 
00466     d = ( a * c - b * b );
00467 
00468     if ( ABS ( d ) < (double)ALMOST_ZERO )
00469     {
00470         *w1 = *w2 = *w3 = 1.0 / 3.0;
00471         return;
00472     }
00473 
00474     w1[0] = ( float ) ( ( e * c - b * f ) / d );
00475 
00476     if ( w1[0] < 0 )
00477         w1[0] = 0;
00478 
00479     w2[0] = ( float ) ( ( f - b * ( double ) w1[0] ) / c );
00480 
00481     if ( w2[0] < 0 )
00482         w2[0] = 0;
00483 
00484     w3[0] = 1.0f - w1[0] - w2[0];
00485 }
00486 
00487 DO_INLINE void collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( float to[3], float v1[3], float v2[3], float v3[3], double w1, double w2, double w3 )
00488 {
00489     zero_v3(to);
00490     VECADDMUL(to, v1, w1);
00491     VECADDMUL(to, v2, w2);
00492     VECADDMUL(to, v3, w3);
00493 }
00494 
00495 #ifndef WITH_ELTOPO
00496 static int cloth_collision_response_static ( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair, CollPair *collision_end )
00497 {
00498     int result = 0;
00499     Cloth *cloth1;
00500     float w1, w2, w3, u1, u2, u3;
00501     float v1[3], v2[3], relativeVelocity[3];
00502     float magrelVel;
00503     float epsilon2 = BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree );
00504 
00505     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
00506 
00507     for ( ; collpair != collision_end; collpair++ )
00508     {
00509         // only handle static collisions here
00510         if ( collpair->flag & COLLISION_IN_FUTURE )
00511             continue;
00512 
00513         // compute barycentric coordinates for both collision points
00514         collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pa,
00515             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].txold,
00516             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].txold,
00517             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].txold,
00518             &w1, &w2, &w3 );
00519 
00520         // was: txold
00521         collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pb,
00522             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp1].co,
00523             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp2].co,
00524             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp3].co,
00525             &u1, &u2, &u3 );
00526 
00527         // Calculate relative "velocity".
00528         collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v1, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].tv, w1, w2, w3 );
00529 
00530         collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v2, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp2].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp3].co, u1, u2, u3 );
00531 
00532         sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, v2, v1 );
00533 
00534         // Calculate the normal component of the relative velocity (actually only the magnitude - the direction is stored in 'normal').
00535         magrelVel = dot_v3v3( relativeVelocity, collpair->normal );
00536 
00537         // printf("magrelVel: %f\n", magrelVel);
00538 
00539         // Calculate masses of points.
00540         // TODO
00541 
00542         // If v_n_mag < 0 the edges are approaching each other.
00543         if ( magrelVel > ALMOST_ZERO )
00544         {
00545             // Calculate Impulse magnitude to stop all motion in normal direction.
00546             float magtangent = 0, repulse = 0, d = 0;
00547             double impulse = 0.0;
00548             float vrel_t_pre[3];
00549             float temp[3], spf;
00550 
00551             // calculate tangential velocity
00552             copy_v3_v3 ( temp, collpair->normal );
00553             mul_v3_fl( temp, magrelVel );
00554             sub_v3_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre, relativeVelocity, temp );
00555 
00556             // Decrease in magnitude of relative tangential velocity due to coulomb friction
00557             // in original formula "magrelVel" should be the "change of relative velocity in normal direction"
00558             magtangent = MIN2 ( clmd->coll_parms->friction * 0.01f * magrelVel, sqrtf( dot_v3v3( vrel_t_pre,vrel_t_pre ) ) );
00559 
00560             // Apply friction impulse.
00561             if ( magtangent > ALMOST_ZERO )
00562             {
00563                 normalize_v3( vrel_t_pre );
00564 
00565                 impulse = magtangent / ( 1.0f + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 ); // 2.0 *
00566                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w1 * impulse );
00567                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w2 * impulse );
00568                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w3 * impulse );
00569             }
00570 
00571             // Apply velocity stopping impulse
00572             // I_c = m * v_N / 2.0
00573             // no 2.0 * magrelVel normally, but looks nicer DG
00574             impulse =  magrelVel / ( 1.0 + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 );
00575 
00576             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, collpair->normal, w1 * impulse );
00577             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse_count++;
00578 
00579             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, collpair->normal, w2 * impulse );
00580             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse_count++;
00581 
00582             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, collpair->normal, w3 * impulse );
00583             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse_count++;
00584 
00585             // Apply repulse impulse if distance too short
00586             // I_r = -min(dt*kd, m(0,1d/dt - v_n))
00587             spf = (float)clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame / clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
00588 
00589             d = clmd->coll_parms->epsilon*8.0f/9.0f + epsilon2*8.0f/9.0f - collpair->distance;
00590             if ( ( magrelVel < 0.1f*d*spf ) && ( d > ALMOST_ZERO ) )
00591             {
00592                 repulse = MIN2 ( d*1.0f/spf, 0.1f*d*spf - magrelVel );
00593 
00594                 // stay on the safe side and clamp repulse
00595                 if ( impulse > ALMOST_ZERO )
00596                     repulse = MIN2 ( repulse, 5.0*impulse );
00597                 repulse = MAX2 ( impulse, repulse );
00598 
00599                 impulse = repulse / ( 1.0f + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 ); // original 2.0 / 0.25
00600                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
00601                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
00602                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
00603             }
00604 
00605             result = 1;
00606         }
00607     }
00608     return result;
00609 }
00610 #endif /* !WITH_ELTOPO */
00611 
00612 #ifdef WITH_ELTOPO
00613 typedef struct edgepairkey {
00614     int a1, a2, b1, b2;
00615 } edgepairkey;
00616 
00617 unsigned int edgepair_hash(void *vkey)
00618 {
00619     edgepairkey *key = vkey;
00620     int keys[4] = {key->a1, key->a2, key->b1, key->b2};
00621     int i, j;
00622     
00623     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00624         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00625             if (keys[j] >= keys[j+1]) {
00626                 SWAP(int, keys[j], keys[j+1]);
00627             }
00628         }
00629     }
00630     
00631     return keys[0]*101 + keys[1]*72 + keys[2]*53 + keys[3]*34;
00632 }
00633 
00634 int edgepair_cmp(const void *va, const void *vb)
00635 {
00636     edgepairkey *a = va, *b = vb;
00637     int keysa[4] = {a->a1, a->a2, a->b1, a->b2};
00638     int keysb[4] = {b->a1, b->a2, b->b1, b->b2};
00639     int i;
00640     
00641     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
00642         int j, ok=0;
00643         for (j=0; j<4; j++) {
00644             if (keysa[i] == keysa[j]) {
00645                 ok = 1;
00646                 break;
00647             }
00648         }
00649         if (!ok)
00650             return -1;
00651     }
00652     
00653     return 0;
00654 }
00655 
00656 static void get_edgepairkey(edgepairkey *key, int a1, int a2, int b1, int b2)
00657 {
00658     key->a1 = a1;
00659     key->a2 = a2;
00660     key->b1 = b1;
00661     key->b2 = b2;
00662 }
00663 
00664 /*an immense amount of duplication goes on here. . .a major performance hit, I'm sure*/
00665 static CollPair* cloth_edge_collision ( ModifierData *md1, ModifierData *md2, 
00666                                         BVHTreeOverlap *overlap, CollPair *collpair,
00667                                         GHash *visithash, MemArena *arena)
00668 {
00669     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData *)md1;
00670     CollisionModifierData *collmd = (CollisionModifierData *) md2;
00671     MFace *face1=NULL, *face2 = NULL;
00672     ClothVertex *verts1 = clmd->clothObject->verts;
00673     double distance = 0;
00674     edgepairkey *key, tstkey;
00675     float epsilon1 = clmd->coll_parms->epsilon;
00676     float epsilon2 = BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree );
00677     float no[3], uv[3], t, relnor;
00678     int i, i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6;
00679     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
00680     float n1[3], n2[3], off[3], v1[2][3], v2[2][3], v3[2][3], v4[2][3], v5[2][3], v6[2][3];
00681     void **verts[] = {v1, v2, v3, v4, v5, v6};
00682     int j, ret, bp1, bp2, bp3, ap1, ap2, ap3, table[6];
00683     
00684     face1 = & ( clmd->clothObject->mfaces[overlap->indexA] );
00685     face2 = & ( collmd->mfaces[overlap->indexB] );
00686 
00687     // check all 4 possible collisions
00688     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
00689     {
00690         if ( i == 0 )
00691         {
00692             // fill faceA
00693             ap1 = face1->v1;
00694             ap2 = face1->v2;
00695             ap3 = face1->v3;
00696 
00697             // fill faceB
00698             bp1 = face2->v1;
00699             bp2 = face2->v2;
00700             bp3 = face2->v3;
00701         }
00702         else if ( i == 1 )
00703         {
00704             if ( face1->v4 )
00705             {
00706                 // fill faceA
00707                 ap1 = face1->v1;
00708                 ap2 = face1->v3;
00709                 ap3 = face1->v4;
00710 
00711                 // fill faceB
00712                 bp1 = face2->v1;
00713                 bp2 = face2->v2;
00714                 bp3 = face2->v3;
00715             }
00716             else {
00717                 continue;
00718             }
00719         }
00720         if ( i == 2 )
00721         {
00722             if ( face2->v4 )
00723             {
00724                 // fill faceA
00725                 ap1 = face1->v1;
00726                 ap2 = face1->v2;
00727                 ap3 = face1->v3;
00728 
00729                 // fill faceB
00730                 bp1 = face2->v1;
00731                 bp2 = face2->v3;
00732                 bp3 = face2->v4;
00733             }
00734             else {
00735                 continue;
00736             }
00737         }
00738         else if ( i == 3 )
00739         {
00740             if ( face1->v4 && face2->v4 )
00741             {
00742                 // fill faceA
00743                 ap1 = face1->v1;
00744                 ap2 = face1->v3;
00745                 ap3 = face1->v4;
00746 
00747                 // fill faceB
00748                 bp1 = face2->v1;
00749                 bp2 = face2->v3;
00750                 bp3 = face2->v4;
00751             }
00752             else {
00753                 continue;
00754             }
00755         }
00756         
00757         copy_v3_v3(v1[0], cloth->verts[ap1].txold); 
00758         copy_v3_v3(v1[1], cloth->verts[ap1].tx);
00759         copy_v3_v3(v2[0], cloth->verts[ap2].txold);
00760         copy_v3_v3(v2[1], cloth->verts[ap2].tx);
00761         copy_v3_v3(v3[0], cloth->verts[ap3].txold);
00762         copy_v3_v3(v3[1], cloth->verts[ap3].tx);
00763         
00764         copy_v3_v3(v4[0], collmd->current_x[bp1].co);
00765         copy_v3_v3(v4[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp1].co);
00766         copy_v3_v3(v5[0], collmd->current_x[bp2].co);
00767         copy_v3_v3(v5[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp2].co);
00768         copy_v3_v3(v6[0], collmd->current_x[bp3].co);
00769         copy_v3_v3(v6[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp3].co);
00770         
00771         normal_tri_v3(n2, v4[1], v5[1], v6[1]);
00772 
00773         /*offset new positions a bit, to account for margins*/
00774         i1 = ap1; i2 = ap2; i3 = ap3;
00775         i4 = bp1; i5 = bp2; i6 = bp3;
00776 
00777         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00778             int collp1, collp2, k, j2 = (j+1)%3;
00779             
00780             table[0] = ap1; table[1] = ap2; table[2] = ap3;
00781             table[3] = bp1; table[4] = bp2; table[5] = bp3;
00782             for (k=0; k<3; k++) {
00783                 float p1[3], p2[3];
00784                 int k2 = (k+1)%3;
00785                 
00786                 get_edgepairkey(&tstkey, table[j], table[j2], table[k+3], table[k2+3]);
00787                 //if (BLI_ghash_haskey(visithash, &tstkey))
00788                 //  continue;
00789                 
00790                 key = BLI_memarena_alloc(arena, sizeof(edgepairkey));
00791                 *key = tstkey;
00792                 BLI_ghash_insert(visithash, key, NULL);
00793 
00794                 sub_v3_v3v3(p1, verts[j], verts[j2]);
00795                 sub_v3_v3v3(p2, verts[k+3], verts[k2+3]);
00796                 
00797                 cross_v3_v3v3(off, p1, p2);
00798                 normalize_v3(off);
00799 
00800                 if (dot_v3v3(n2, off) < 0.0)
00801                     negate_v3(off);
00802                 
00803                 mul_v3_fl(off,  epsilon1 + epsilon2 + ALMOST_ZERO);
00804                 copy_v3_v3(p1, verts[k+3]);
00805                 copy_v3_v3(p2, verts[k2+3]);
00806                 add_v3_v3(p1, off);
00807                 add_v3_v3(p2, off);
00808                 
00809                 ret = eltopo_line_line_moving_isect_v3v3_f(verts[j], table[j], verts[j2], table[j2], 
00810                                                            p1, table[k+3], p2, table[k2+3], 
00811                                                            no, uv, &t, &relnor);
00812                 /*cloth vert versus coll face*/
00813                 if (ret) {
00814                     collpair->ap1 = table[j]; collpair->ap2 = table[j2]; 
00815                     collpair->bp1 = table[k+3]; collpair->bp2 = table[k2+3];
00816                     
00817                     /*I'm not sure if this is correct, but hopefully it's 
00818                       better then simply ignoring back edges*/
00819                     if (dot_v3v3(n2, no) < 0.0) {
00820                         negate_v3(no);
00821                     }
00822                     
00823                     copy_v3_v3(collpair->normal, no);
00824                     mul_v3_v3fl(collpair->vector, collpair->normal, relnor);
00825                     collpair->distance = relnor;
00826                     collpair->time = t;
00827                     
00828                     copy_v2_v2(collpair->bary, uv);
00829                     
00830                     collpair->flag = COLLISION_IS_EDGES;
00831                     collpair++;
00832                 }
00833             }
00834         }
00835     }
00836     
00837     return collpair;
00838 }
00839 
00840 static int cloth_edge_collision_response_moving ( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair, CollPair *collision_end )
00841 {
00842     int result = 0;
00843     Cloth *cloth1;
00844     float w1, w2;
00845     float v1[3], v2[3], relativeVelocity[3];
00846     float magrelVel, pimpulse[3];
00847 
00848     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
00849 
00850     for ( ; collpair != collision_end; collpair++ )
00851     {
00852         if (!(collpair->flag & COLLISION_IS_EDGES))
00853             continue;
00854         
00855         // was: txold
00856         w1 = collpair->bary[0]; w2 = collpair->bary[1];         
00857         
00858         // Calculate relative "velocity".
00859         VECADDFAC(v1, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].tv, w1);
00860         VECADDFAC(v2, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp2].co, w2);
00861         
00862         sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, v2, v1);
00863         
00864         // Calculate the normal component of the relative velocity (actually only the magnitude - the direction is stored in 'normal').
00865         magrelVel = dot_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, collpair->normal );
00866 
00867         // If v_n_mag < 0 the edges are approaching each other.
00868         if ( magrelVel > ALMOST_ZERO )
00869         {
00870             // Calculate Impulse magnitude to stop all motion in normal direction.
00871             float magtangent = 0, repulse = 0, d = 0;
00872             double impulse = 0.0;
00873             float vrel_t_pre[3];
00874             float temp[3], spf;
00875             
00876             zero_v3(pimpulse);
00877             
00878             // calculate tangential velocity
00879             copy_v3_v3 ( temp, collpair->normal );
00880             mul_v3_fl( temp, magrelVel );
00881             sub_v3_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre, relativeVelocity, temp );
00882 
00883             // Decrease in magnitude of relative tangential velocity due to coulomb friction
00884             // in original formula "magrelVel" should be the "change of relative velocity in normal direction"
00885             magtangent = MIN2 ( clmd->coll_parms->friction * 0.01 * magrelVel,sqrt ( dot_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre,vrel_t_pre ) ) );
00886 
00887             // Apply friction impulse.
00888             if ( magtangent > ALMOST_ZERO )
00889             {
00890                 normalize_v3( vrel_t_pre );
00891 
00892                 impulse = magtangent; 
00893                 VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, vrel_t_pre, impulse);
00894             }
00895 
00896             // Apply velocity stopping impulse
00897             // I_c = m * v_N / 2.0
00898             // no 2.0 * magrelVel normally, but looks nicer DG
00899             impulse =  magrelVel;
00900             
00901             mul_v3_fl(collpair->normal, 0.5);
00902             VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
00903 
00904             // Apply repulse impulse if distance too short
00905             // I_r = -min(dt*kd, m(0,1d/dt - v_n))
00906             spf = (float)clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame / clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
00907 
00908             d = collpair->distance;
00909             if ( ( magrelVel < 0.1*d*spf && ( d > ALMOST_ZERO ) ) )
00910             {
00911                 repulse = MIN2 ( d*1.0/spf, 0.1*d*spf - magrelVel );
00912 
00913                 // stay on the safe side and clamp repulse
00914                 if ( impulse > ALMOST_ZERO )
00915                     repulse = MIN2 ( repulse, 5.0*impulse );
00916                 repulse = MAX2 ( impulse, repulse );
00917 
00918                 impulse = repulse / ( 5.0 ); // original 2.0 / 0.25
00919                 VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
00920             }
00921             
00922             w2 = 1.0f-w1;
00923             if (w1 < 0.5)
00924                 w1 *= 2.0;
00925             else
00926                 w2 *= 2.0;
00927             
00928             VECADDFAC(cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, pimpulse, w1*2.0);
00929             VECADDFAC(cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, pimpulse, w2*2.0);
00930             
00931             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse_count++;
00932             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse_count++;
00933             
00934             result = 1;
00935         }
00936     } 
00937     
00938     return result;
00939 }
00940 
00941 static int cloth_collision_response_moving ( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair, CollPair *collision_end )
00942 {
00943     int result = 0;
00944     Cloth *cloth1;
00945     float w1, w2, w3, u1, u2, u3;
00946     float v1[3], v2[3], relativeVelocity[3];
00947     float magrelVel;
00948     float epsilon2 = BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree );
00949     
00950     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
00951 
00952     for ( ; collpair != collision_end; collpair++ )
00953     {
00954         if (collpair->flag & COLLISION_IS_EDGES)
00955             continue;
00956         
00957         if ( collpair->flag & COLLISION_USE_COLLFACE ) {
00958             // was: txold
00959             w1 = collpair->bary[0]; w2 = collpair->bary[1]; w3 = collpair->bary[2];         
00960 
00961             // Calculate relative "velocity".
00962             collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v1, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp2].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp3].co, w1, w2, w3);
00963             
00964             sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, v1, cloth1->verts[collpair->collp].tv);
00965             
00966             // Calculate the normal component of the relative velocity (actually only the magnitude - the direction is stored in 'normal').
00967             magrelVel = dot_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, collpair->normal );
00968     
00969             // If v_n_mag < 0 the edges are approaching each other.
00970             if ( magrelVel > ALMOST_ZERO )
00971             {
00972                 // Calculate Impulse magnitude to stop all motion in normal direction.
00973                 float magtangent = 0, repulse = 0, d = 0;
00974                 double impulse = 0.0;
00975                 float vrel_t_pre[3];
00976                 float temp[3], spf;
00977     
00978                 // calculate tangential velocity
00979                 copy_v3_v3 ( temp, collpair->normal );
00980                 mul_v3_fl( temp, magrelVel );
00981                 sub_v3_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre, relativeVelocity, temp );
00982     
00983                 // Decrease in magnitude of relative tangential velocity due to coulomb friction
00984                 // in original formula "magrelVel" should be the "change of relative velocity in normal direction"
00985                 magtangent = MIN2 ( clmd->coll_parms->friction * 0.01 * magrelVel,sqrt ( dot_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre,vrel_t_pre ) ) );
00986     
00987                 // Apply friction impulse.
00988                 if ( magtangent > ALMOST_ZERO )
00989                 {
00990                     normalize_v3( vrel_t_pre );
00991     
00992                     impulse = magtangent; // 2.0 * 
00993                     VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->collp].impulse, vrel_t_pre, impulse);
00994                 }
00995     
00996                 // Apply velocity stopping impulse
00997                 // I_c = m * v_N / 2.0
00998                 // no 2.0 * magrelVel normally, but looks nicer DG
00999                 impulse =  magrelVel/2.0;
01000     
01001                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->collp].impulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
01002                 cloth1->verts[collpair->collp].impulse_count++;
01003     
01004                 // Apply repulse impulse if distance too short
01005                 // I_r = -min(dt*kd, m(0,1d/dt - v_n))
01006                 spf = (float)clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame / clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
01007     
01008                 d = -collpair->distance;
01009                 if ( ( magrelVel < 0.1*d*spf ) && ( d > ALMOST_ZERO ) )
01010                 {
01011                     repulse = MIN2 ( d*1.0/spf, 0.1*d*spf - magrelVel );
01012     
01013                     // stay on the safe side and clamp repulse
01014                     if ( impulse > ALMOST_ZERO )
01015                         repulse = MIN2 ( repulse, 5.0*impulse );
01016                     repulse = MAX2 ( impulse, repulse );
01017     
01018                     impulse = repulse / ( 5.0 ); // original 2.0 / 0.25
01019                     VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->collp].impulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
01020                 }
01021     
01022                 result = 1;
01023             }
01024         }
01025         else {
01026             w1 = collpair->bary[0]; w2 = collpair->bary[1]; w3 = collpair->bary[2];         
01027 
01028             // Calculate relative "velocity".
01029             collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v1, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].tv, w1, w2, w3 );
01030     
01031             sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, collmd->current_v[collpair->collp].co, v1);
01032             
01033             // Calculate the normal component of the relative velocity (actually only the magnitude - the direction is stored in 'normal').
01034             magrelVel = dot_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, collpair->normal );
01035     
01036             // If v_n_mag < 0 the edges are approaching each other.
01037             if ( magrelVel > ALMOST_ZERO )
01038             {
01039                 // Calculate Impulse magnitude to stop all motion in normal direction.
01040                 float magtangent = 0, repulse = 0, d = 0;
01041                 double impulse = 0.0;
01042                 float vrel_t_pre[3], pimpulse[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
01043                 float temp[3], spf;
01044     
01045                 // calculate tangential velocity
01046                 copy_v3_v3 ( temp, collpair->normal );
01047                 mul_v3_fl( temp, magrelVel );
01048                 sub_v3_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre, relativeVelocity, temp );
01049     
01050                 // Decrease in magnitude of relative tangential velocity due to coulomb friction
01051                 // in original formula "magrelVel" should be the "change of relative velocity in normal direction"
01052                 magtangent = MIN2 ( clmd->coll_parms->friction * 0.01 * magrelVel,sqrt ( dot_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre,vrel_t_pre ) ) );
01053     
01054                 // Apply friction impulse.
01055                 if ( magtangent > ALMOST_ZERO )
01056                 {
01057                     normalize_v3( vrel_t_pre );
01058     
01059                     impulse = magtangent; // 2.0 * 
01060                     VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, vrel_t_pre, impulse);
01061                 }
01062     
01063                 // Apply velocity stopping impulse
01064                 // I_c = m * v_N / 2.0
01065                 // no 2.0 * magrelVel normally, but looks nicer DG
01066                 impulse =  magrelVel/2.0;
01067     
01068                 VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
01069     
01070                 // Apply repulse impulse if distance too short
01071                 // I_r = -min(dt*kd, m(0,1d/dt - v_n))
01072                 spf = (float)clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame / clmd->sim_parms->timescale;
01073     
01074                 d = -collpair->distance;
01075                 if ( ( magrelVel < 0.1*d*spf ) && ( d > ALMOST_ZERO ) )
01076                 {
01077                     repulse = MIN2 ( d*1.0/spf, 0.1*d*spf - magrelVel );
01078     
01079                     // stay on the safe side and clamp repulse
01080                     if ( impulse > ALMOST_ZERO )
01081                         repulse = MIN2 ( repulse, 5.0*impulse );
01082                     repulse = MAX2 ( impulse, repulse );
01083     
01084                     impulse = repulse / ( 2.0 ); // original 2.0 / 0.25
01085                     VECADDMUL ( pimpulse, collpair->normal, impulse);
01086                 }
01087                 
01088                 if (w1 < 0.5) w1 *= 2.0;
01089                 if (w2 < 0.5) w2 *= 2.0;
01090                 if (w3 < 0.5) w3 *= 2.0;
01091                 
01092                 VECADDMUL(cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, pimpulse, w1*2.0);
01093                 VECADDMUL(cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, pimpulse, w2*2.0);
01094                 VECADDMUL(cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, pimpulse, w3*2.0);
01095                 cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse_count++;
01096                 cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse_count++;
01097                 cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse_count++;
01098                 
01099                 result = 1;
01100             }
01101         }
01102     } 
01103     
01104     return result;
01105 }
01106 
01107 
01108 typedef struct tripairkey {
01109     int p, a1, a2, a3;
01110 } tripairkey;
01111 
01112 unsigned int tripair_hash(void *vkey)
01113 {
01114     tripairkey *key = vkey;
01115     int keys[4] = {key->p, key->a1, key->a2, key->a3};
01116     int i, j;
01117     
01118     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
01119         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
01120             if (keys[j] >= keys[j+1]) {
01121                 SWAP(int, keys[j], keys[j+1]);
01122             }
01123         }
01124     }
01125     
01126     return keys[0]*101 + keys[1]*72 + keys[2]*53 + keys[3]*34;
01127 }
01128 
01129 int tripair_cmp(const void *va, const void *vb)
01130 {
01131     tripairkey *a = va, *b = vb;
01132     int keysa[4] = {a->p, a->a1, a->a2, a->a3};
01133     int keysb[4] = {b->p, b->a1, b->a2, b->a3};
01134     int i;
01135     
01136     for (i=0; i<4; i++) {
01137         int j, ok=0;
01138         for (j=0; j<4; j++) {
01139             if (keysa[i] == keysa[j]) {
01140                 ok = 1;
01141                 break;
01142             }
01143         }
01144         if (!ok)
01145             return -1;
01146     }
01147     
01148     return 0;
01149 }
01150 
01151 static void get_tripairkey(tripairkey *key, int p, int a1, int a2, int a3)
01152 {
01153     key->a1 = a1;
01154     key->a2 = a2;
01155     key->a3 = a3;
01156     key->p = p;
01157 }
01158 
01159 static int checkvisit(MemArena *arena, GHash *gh, int p, int a1, int a2, int a3)
01160 {
01161     tripairkey key, *key2;
01162     
01163     get_tripairkey(&key, p, a1, a2, a3);
01164     if (BLI_ghash_haskey(gh, &key))
01165         return 1;
01166     
01167     key2 = BLI_memarena_alloc(arena, sizeof(*key2));
01168     *key2 = key;
01169     BLI_ghash_insert(gh, key2, NULL);
01170     
01171     return 0;
01172 }
01173 
01174 int cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(float v1[2][3], int i1, float v2[2][3], int i2,
01175                                    float v3[2][3],  int i3, float v4[2][3], int i4,
01176                                    float normal[3], float bary[3], float *t, 
01177                                    float *relnor, GHash *gh, MemArena *arena)
01178 {
01179     if (checkvisit(arena, gh, i1, i2, i3, i4))
01180         return 0;
01181     
01182     return eltopo_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v1, i1, v2, i2, v3, i3, v4, i4, normal, bary, t, relnor);
01183 }
01184 
01185 static CollPair* cloth_collision ( ModifierData *md1, ModifierData *md2, BVHTreeOverlap *overlap, 
01186                                    CollPair *collpair, double dt, GHash *gh, MemArena *arena)
01187 {
01188     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData *)md1;
01189     CollisionModifierData *collmd = (CollisionModifierData *) md2;
01190     MFace *face1=NULL, *face2 = NULL;
01191     ClothVertex *verts1 = clmd->clothObject->verts;
01192     double distance = 0;
01193     float epsilon1 = clmd->coll_parms->epsilon;
01194     float epsilon2 = BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree );
01195     float no[3], uv[3], t, relnor;
01196     int i, i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6;
01197     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01198     float n1[3], sdis, p[3], l, n2[3], off[3], v1[2][3], v2[2][3], v3[2][3], v4[2][3], v5[2][3], v6[2][3];
01199     int j, ret, bp1, bp2, bp3, ap1, ap2, ap3;
01200     
01201     face1 = & ( clmd->clothObject->mfaces[overlap->indexA] );
01202     face2 = & ( collmd->mfaces[overlap->indexB] );
01203 
01204     // check all 4 possible collisions
01205     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
01206     {
01207         if ( i == 0 )
01208         {
01209             // fill faceA
01210             ap1 = face1->v1;
01211             ap2 = face1->v2;
01212             ap3 = face1->v3;
01213 
01214             // fill faceB
01215             bp1 = face2->v1;
01216             bp2 = face2->v2;
01217             bp3 = face2->v3;
01218         }
01219         else if ( i == 1 )
01220         {
01221             if ( face1->v4 )
01222             {
01223                 // fill faceA
01224                 ap1 = face1->v1;
01225                 ap2 = face1->v3;
01226                 ap3 = face1->v4;
01227 
01228                 // fill faceB
01229                 bp1 = face2->v1;
01230                 bp2 = face2->v2;
01231                 bp3 = face2->v3;
01232             }
01233             else {
01234                 continue;
01235             }
01236         }
01237         if ( i == 2 )
01238         {
01239             if ( face2->v4 )
01240             {
01241                 // fill faceA
01242                 ap1 = face1->v1;
01243                 ap2 = face1->v2;
01244                 ap3 = face1->v3;
01245 
01246                 // fill faceB
01247                 bp1 = face2->v1;
01248                 bp2 = face2->v3;
01249                 bp3 = face2->v4;
01250             }
01251             else {
01252                 continue;
01253             }
01254         }
01255         else if ( i == 3 )
01256         {
01257             if ( face1->v4 && face2->v4 )
01258             {
01259                 // fill faceA
01260                 ap1 = face1->v1;
01261                 ap2 = face1->v3;
01262                 ap3 = face1->v4;
01263 
01264                 // fill faceB
01265                 bp1 = face2->v1;
01266                 bp2 = face2->v3;
01267                 bp3 = face2->v4;
01268             }
01269             else {
01270                 continue;
01271             }
01272         }
01273         
01274         copy_v3_v3(v1[0], cloth->verts[ap1].txold); 
01275         copy_v3_v3(v1[1], cloth->verts[ap1].tx);
01276         copy_v3_v3(v2[0], cloth->verts[ap2].txold);
01277         copy_v3_v3(v2[1], cloth->verts[ap2].tx);
01278         copy_v3_v3(v3[0], cloth->verts[ap3].txold);
01279         copy_v3_v3(v3[1], cloth->verts[ap3].tx);
01280         
01281         copy_v3_v3(v4[0], collmd->current_x[bp1].co);
01282         copy_v3_v3(v4[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp1].co);
01283         copy_v3_v3(v5[0], collmd->current_x[bp2].co);
01284         copy_v3_v3(v5[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp2].co);
01285         copy_v3_v3(v6[0], collmd->current_x[bp3].co);
01286         copy_v3_v3(v6[1], collmd->current_xnew[bp3].co);
01287         
01288         normal_tri_v3(n2, v4[1], v5[1], v6[1]);
01289         
01290         sdis = clmd->coll_parms->distance_repel + epsilon2 + FLT_EPSILON;
01291 
01292         /*apply a repulsion force, to help the solver along*/
01293         copy_v3_v3(off, n2);
01294         negate_v3(off);
01295         if (isect_ray_plane_v3(v1[1], off, v4[1], v5[1], v6[1], &l, 0)) {
01296             if (l >= 0.0 && l < sdis) {
01297                 mul_v3_fl(off, (l-sdis)*cloth->verts[ap1].mass*dt*clmd->coll_parms->repel_force*0.1);
01298 
01299                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[ap1].tv, off);
01300                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[ap2].tv, off);
01301                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[ap3].tv, off);
01302             }
01303         }
01304 
01305         /*offset new positions a bit, to account for margins*/
01306         copy_v3_v3(off, n2);
01307         mul_v3_fl(off,  epsilon1 + epsilon2 + ALMOST_ZERO);
01308         add_v3_v3(v4[1], off); add_v3_v3(v5[1], off); add_v3_v3(v6[1], off);
01309         
01310         i1 = ap1; i2 = ap2; i3 = ap3;
01311         i4 = bp1+cloth->numverts; i5 = bp2+cloth->numverts; i6 = bp3+cloth->numverts;
01312         
01313         for (j=0; j<6; j++) {
01314             int collp;
01315 
01316             switch (j) {
01317             case 0:
01318                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v1, i1, v4, i4, v5, i5, v6, i6, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01319                 collp = ap1;
01320                 break;
01321             case 1:
01322                 collp = ap2;
01323                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v2, i2, v4, i4, v5, i5, v6, i6, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01324                 break;
01325             case 2:
01326                 collp = ap3;
01327                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v3, i3, v4, i4, v5, i5, v6, i6, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01328                 break;
01329             case 3:
01330                 collp = bp1;
01331                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v4, i4, v1, i1, v2, i2, v3, i3, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01332                 break;
01333             case 4:
01334                 collp = bp2;                
01335                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v5, i5, v1, i1, v2, i2, v3, i3, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01336                 break;
01337             case 5:
01338                 collp = bp3;
01339                 ret = cloth_point_tri_moving_v3v3_f(v6, i6, v1, i1, v2, i2, v3, i3, no, uv, &t, &relnor, gh, arena);
01340                 break;
01341             }
01342             
01343             /*cloth vert versus coll face*/
01344             if (ret && j < 3) {
01345                 collpair->bp1 = bp1; collpair->bp2 = bp2; collpair->bp3 = bp3;
01346                 collpair->collp = collp;
01347                 
01348                 copy_v3_v3(collpair->normal, no);
01349                 mul_v3_v3fl(collpair->vector, collpair->normal, relnor);
01350                 collpair->distance = relnor;
01351                 collpair->time = t;
01352                 
01353                 copy_v3_v3(collpair->bary, uv);
01354                 
01355                 collpair->flag = COLLISION_USE_COLLFACE;
01356                 collpair++;
01357             }
01358             else if (ret && j >= 3) { /*coll vert versus cloth face*/
01359                 collpair->ap1 = ap1; collpair->ap2 = ap2; collpair->ap3 = ap3;
01360                 collpair->collp = collp;
01361                 
01362                 copy_v3_v3(collpair->normal, no);
01363                 mul_v3_v3fl(collpair->vector, collpair->normal, relnor);
01364                 collpair->distance = relnor;
01365                 collpair->time = t;
01366                 
01367                 copy_v3_v3(collpair->bary, uv);
01368 
01369                 collpair->flag = 0;
01370                 collpair++;
01371             }
01372         }
01373     }
01374     
01375     return collpair;
01376 }
01377 
01378 static void machine_epsilon_offset(Cloth *cloth)
01379 {
01380     ClothVertex *cv;
01381     int i, j;
01382     
01383     cv = cloth->verts;
01384     for (i=0; i<cloth->numverts; i++, cv++) {
01385         /*aggrevatingly enough, it's necessary to offset the coordinates
01386          by a multiple of the 32-bit floating point epsilon when switching
01387          into doubles*/
01388         #define RNDSIGN (float)(-1*(BLI_rand()%2==0)|1)
01389         for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
01390             cv->tx[j] += FLT_EPSILON*30.0f*RNDSIGN;
01391             cv->txold[j] += FLT_EPSILON*30.0f*RNDSIGN;
01392             cv->tv[j] += FLT_EPSILON*30.0f*RNDSIGN;
01393         }       
01394     }
01395 }
01396 
01397 #else /* !WITH_ELTOPO */
01398 
01399 //Determines collisions on overlap, collisions are written to collpair[i] and collision+number_collision_found is returned
01400 static CollPair* cloth_collision ( ModifierData *md1, ModifierData *md2, 
01401     BVHTreeOverlap *overlap, CollPair *collpair, float dt )
01402 {
01403     ClothModifierData *clmd = (ClothModifierData *)md1;
01404     CollisionModifierData *collmd = (CollisionModifierData *) md2;
01405     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
01406     MFace *face1=NULL, *face2 = NULL;
01407 #ifdef USE_BULLET
01408     ClothVertex *verts1 = clmd->clothObject->verts;
01409 #endif
01410     double distance = 0;
01411     float epsilon1 = clmd->coll_parms->epsilon;
01412     float epsilon2 = BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree );
01413     float n2[3], sdis, l;
01414     int i;
01415 
01416     face1 = & ( clmd->clothObject->mfaces[overlap->indexA] );
01417     face2 = & ( collmd->mfaces[overlap->indexB] );
01418 
01419     // check all 4 possible collisions
01420     for ( i = 0; i < 4; i++ )
01421     {
01422         if ( i == 0 )
01423         {
01424             // fill faceA
01425             collpair->ap1 = face1->v1;
01426             collpair->ap2 = face1->v2;
01427             collpair->ap3 = face1->v3;
01428 
01429             // fill faceB
01430             collpair->bp1 = face2->v1;
01431             collpair->bp2 = face2->v2;
01432             collpair->bp3 = face2->v3;
01433         }
01434         else if ( i == 1 )
01435         {
01436             if ( face1->v4 )
01437             {
01438                 // fill faceA
01439                 collpair->ap1 = face1->v1;
01440                 collpair->ap2 = face1->v4;
01441                 collpair->ap3 = face1->v3;
01442 
01443                 // fill faceB
01444                 collpair->bp1 = face2->v1;
01445                 collpair->bp2 = face2->v2;
01446                 collpair->bp3 = face2->v3;
01447             }
01448             else
01449                 i++;
01450         }
01451         if ( i == 2 )
01452         {
01453             if ( face2->v4 )
01454             {
01455                 // fill faceA
01456                 collpair->ap1 = face1->v1;
01457                 collpair->ap2 = face1->v2;
01458                 collpair->ap3 = face1->v3;
01459 
01460                 // fill faceB
01461                 collpair->bp1 = face2->v1;
01462                 collpair->bp2 = face2->v4;
01463                 collpair->bp3 = face2->v3;
01464             }
01465             else
01466                 break;
01467         }
01468         else if ( i == 3 )
01469         {
01470             if ( face1->v4 && face2->v4 )
01471             {
01472                 // fill faceA
01473                 collpair->ap1 = face1->v1;
01474                 collpair->ap2 = face1->v4;
01475                 collpair->ap3 = face1->v3;
01476 
01477                 // fill faceB
01478                 collpair->bp1 = face2->v1;
01479                 collpair->bp2 = face2->v4;
01480                 collpair->bp3 = face2->v3;
01481             }
01482             else
01483                 break;
01484         }
01485         
01486         normal_tri_v3(n2, collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp1].co, 
01487             collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp2].co, 
01488             collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp3].co);
01489         
01490         sdis = clmd->coll_parms->distance_repel + epsilon2 + FLT_EPSILON;
01491         
01492         /* apply a repulsion force, to help the solver along.
01493          * this is kindof crude, it only tests one vert of the triangle */
01494         if (isect_ray_plane_v3(cloth->verts[collpair->ap1].tx, n2, collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp1].co, 
01495             collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp2].co,
01496             collmd->current_xnew[collpair->bp3].co, &l, 0))
01497         {
01498             if (l >= 0.0f && l < sdis) {
01499                 mul_v3_fl(n2, (l-sdis)*cloth->verts[collpair->ap1].mass*dt*clmd->coll_parms->repel_force*0.1f);
01500 
01501                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[collpair->ap1].tv, n2);
01502                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[collpair->ap2].tv, n2);
01503                 add_v3_v3(cloth->verts[collpair->ap3].tv, n2);
01504             }
01505         }
01506         
01507 #ifdef USE_BULLET
01508         // calc distance + normal
01509         distance = plNearestPoints (
01510             verts1[collpair->ap1].txold, verts1[collpair->ap2].txold, verts1[collpair->ap3].txold, collmd->current_x[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_x[collpair->bp2].co, collmd->current_x[collpair->bp3].co, collpair->pa,collpair->pb,collpair->vector );
01511 #else
01512         // just be sure that we don't add anything
01513         distance = 2.0 * (double)( epsilon1 + epsilon2 + ALMOST_ZERO );
01514 #endif
01515 
01516         if ( distance <= ( epsilon1 + epsilon2 + ALMOST_ZERO ) )
01517         {
01518             normalize_v3_v3( collpair->normal, collpair->vector );
01519 
01520             collpair->distance = distance;
01521             collpair->flag = 0;
01522             collpair++;
01523         }/*
01524         else
01525         {
01526             float w1, w2, w3, u1, u2, u3;
01527             float v1[3], v2[3], relativeVelocity[3];
01528 
01529             // calc relative velocity
01530             
01531             // compute barycentric coordinates for both collision points
01532             collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pa,
01533             verts1[collpair->ap1].txold,
01534             verts1[collpair->ap2].txold,
01535             verts1[collpair->ap3].txold,
01536             &w1, &w2, &w3 );
01537 
01538             // was: txold
01539             collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pb,
01540             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp1].co,
01541             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp2].co,
01542             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp3].co,
01543             &u1, &u2, &u3 );
01544 
01545             // Calculate relative "velocity".
01546             collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v1, verts1[collpair->ap1].tv, verts1[collpair->ap2].tv, verts1[collpair->ap3].tv, w1, w2, w3 );
01547 
01548             collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v2, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp2].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp3].co, u1, u2, u3 );
01549 
01550             sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, v2, v1 );
01551 
01552             if (sqrt(dot_v3v3(relativeVelocity, relativeVelocity)) >= distance)
01553             {
01554                 // check for collision in the future
01555                 collpair->flag |= COLLISION_IN_FUTURE;
01556                 collpair++;
01557             }
01558         }*/
01559     }
01560     return collpair;
01561 }
01562 #endif /* WITH_ELTOPO */
01563 
01564 
01565 #if 0
01566 static int cloth_collision_response_moving( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair, CollPair *collision_end )
01567 {
01568     int result = 0;
01569     Cloth *cloth1;
01570     float w1, w2, w3, u1, u2, u3;
01571     float v1[3], v2[3], relativeVelocity[3];
01572     float magrelVel;
01573 
01574     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
01575 
01576     for ( ; collpair != collision_end; collpair++ )
01577     {
01578         // compute barycentric coordinates for both collision points
01579         collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pa,
01580             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].txold,
01581             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].txold,
01582             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].txold,
01583             &w1, &w2, &w3 );
01584 
01585         // was: txold
01586         collision_compute_barycentric ( collpair->pb,
01587             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp1].co,
01588             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp2].co,
01589             collmd->current_x[collpair->bp3].co,
01590             &u1, &u2, &u3 );
01591 
01592         // Calculate relative "velocity".
01593         collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v1, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].tv, cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].tv, w1, w2, w3 );
01594 
01595         collision_interpolateOnTriangle ( v2, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp1].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp2].co, collmd->current_v[collpair->bp3].co, u1, u2, u3 );
01596 
01597         sub_v3_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, v2, v1 );
01598 
01599         // Calculate the normal component of the relative velocity (actually only the magnitude - the direction is stored in 'normal').
01600         magrelVel = dot_v3v3 ( relativeVelocity, collpair->normal );
01601 
01602         // printf("magrelVel: %f\n", magrelVel);
01603 
01604         // Calculate masses of points.
01605         // TODO
01606 
01607         // If v_n_mag < 0 the edges are approaching each other.
01608         if ( magrelVel > ALMOST_ZERO )
01609         {
01610             // Calculate Impulse magnitude to stop all motion in normal direction.
01611             float magtangent = 0;
01612             double impulse = 0.0;
01613             float vrel_t_pre[3];
01614             float temp[3];
01615 
01616             // calculate tangential velocity
01617             copy_v3_v3 ( temp, collpair->normal );
01618             mul_v3_fl( temp, magrelVel );
01619             sub_v3_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre, relativeVelocity, temp );
01620 
01621             // Decrease in magnitude of relative tangential velocity due to coulomb friction
01622             // in original formula "magrelVel" should be the "change of relative velocity in normal direction"
01623             magtangent = MIN2 ( clmd->coll_parms->friction * 0.01 * magrelVel,sqrt ( dot_v3v3 ( vrel_t_pre,vrel_t_pre ) ) );
01624 
01625             // Apply friction impulse.
01626             if ( magtangent > ALMOST_ZERO )
01627             {
01628                 normalize_v3( vrel_t_pre );
01629 
01630                 impulse = 2.0 * magtangent / ( 1.0 + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 );
01631                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w1 * impulse );
01632                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w2 * impulse );
01633                 VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, vrel_t_pre, w3 * impulse );
01634             }
01635 
01636             // Apply velocity stopping impulse
01637             // I_c = m * v_N / 2.0
01638             // no 2.0 * magrelVel normally, but looks nicer DG
01639             impulse =  magrelVel / ( 1.0 + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 );
01640 
01641             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, collpair->normal, w1 * impulse );
01642             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse_count++;
01643 
01644             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, collpair->normal, w2 * impulse );
01645             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse_count++;
01646 
01647             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, collpair->normal, w3 * impulse );
01648             cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse_count++;
01649 
01650             // Apply repulse impulse if distance too short
01651             // I_r = -min(dt*kd, m(0,1d/dt - v_n))
01652             /*
01653             d = clmd->coll_parms->epsilon*8.0/9.0 + epsilon2*8.0/9.0 - collpair->distance;
01654             if ( ( magrelVel < 0.1*d*clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame ) && ( d > ALMOST_ZERO ) )
01655             {
01656             repulse = MIN2 ( d*1.0/clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame, 0.1*d*clmd->sim_parms->stepsPerFrame - magrelVel );
01657 
01658             // stay on the safe side and clamp repulse
01659             if ( impulse > ALMOST_ZERO )
01660             repulse = MIN2 ( repulse, 5.0*impulse );
01661             repulse = MAX2 ( impulse, repulse );
01662 
01663             impulse = repulse / ( 1.0 + w1*w1 + w2*w2 + w3*w3 ); // original 2.0 / 0.25
01664             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap1].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
01665             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap2].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
01666             VECADDMUL ( cloth1->verts[collpair->ap3].impulse, collpair->normal,  impulse );
01667             }
01668             */
01669             result = 1;
01670         }
01671     }
01672     return result;
01673 }
01674 #endif
01675 
01676 #if 0
01677 static float projectPointOntoLine(float *p, float *a, float *b) 
01678 {
01679     float ba[3], pa[3];
01680     sub_v3_v3v3(ba, b, a);
01681     sub_v3_v3v3(pa, p, a);
01682     return dot_v3v3(pa, ba) / dot_v3v3(ba, ba);
01683 }
01684 
01685 static void calculateEENormal(float *np1, float *np2, float *np3, float *np4,float *out_normal) 
01686 {
01687     float line1[3], line2[3];
01688     float length;
01689 
01690     sub_v3_v3v3(line1, np2, np1);
01691     sub_v3_v3v3(line2, np3, np1);
01692 
01693     // printf("l1: %f, l1: %f, l2: %f, l2: %f\n", line1[0], line1[1], line2[0], line2[1]);
01694 
01695     cross_v3_v3v3(out_normal, line1, line2);
01696 
01697     
01698 
01699     length = normalize_v3(out_normal);
01700     if (length <= FLT_EPSILON)
01701     { // lines are collinear
01702         sub_v3_v3v3(out_normal, np2, np1);
01703         normalize_v3(out_normal);
01704     }
01705 }
01706 
01707 static void findClosestPointsEE(float *x1, float *x2, float *x3, float *x4, float *w1, float *w2)
01708 {
01709     float temp[3], temp2[3];
01710     
01711     double a, b, c, e, f; 
01712 
01713     sub_v3_v3v3(temp, x2, x1);
01714     a = dot_v3v3(temp, temp);
01715 
01716     sub_v3_v3v3(temp2, x4, x3);
01717     b = -dot_v3v3(temp, temp2);
01718 
01719     c = dot_v3v3(temp2, temp2);
01720 
01721     sub_v3_v3v3(temp2, x3, x1);
01722     e = dot_v3v3(temp, temp2);
01723 
01724     sub_v3_v3v3(temp, x4, x3);
01725     f = -dot_v3v3(temp, temp2);
01726 
01727     *w1 = (e * c - b * f) / (a * c - b * b);
01728     *w2 = (f - b * *w1) / c;
01729 
01730 }
01731 
01732 // calculates the distance of 2 edges
01733 static float edgedge_distance(float np11[3], float np12[3], float np21[3], float np22[3], float *out_a1, float *out_a2, float *out_normal)
01734 {
01735     float line1[3], line2[3], cross[3];
01736     float length;
01737     float temp[3], temp2[3];
01738     float dist_a1, dist_a2;
01739     
01740     sub_v3_v3v3(line1, np12, np11);
01741     sub_v3_v3v3(line2, np22, np21);
01742 
01743     cross_v3_v3v3(cross, line1, line2);
01744     length = dot_v3v3(cross, cross);
01745 
01746     if (length < FLT_EPSILON) 
01747     {
01748         *out_a2 = projectPointOntoLine(np11, np21, np22);
01749         if ((*out_a2 >= -FLT_EPSILON) && (*out_a2 <= 1.0 + FLT_EPSILON)) 
01750         {
01751             *out_a1 = 0;
01752             calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01753             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np22, np21);
01754             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a2);
01755             VECADD(temp2, temp, np21);
01756             VECADD(temp2, temp2, np11);
01757             return dot_v3v3(temp2, temp2);
01758         }
01759 
01760         CLAMP(*out_a2, 0.0, 1.0);
01761         if (*out_a2 > .5) 
01762         { // == 1.0
01763             *out_a1 = projectPointOntoLine(np22, np11, np12);
01764             if ((*out_a1 >= -FLT_EPSILON) && (*out_a1 <= 1.0 + FLT_EPSILON)) 
01765             {
01766                 calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01767 
01768                 // return (np22 - (np11 + (np12 - np11) * out_a1)).lengthSquared();
01769                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np11);
01770                 mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a1);
01771                 VECADD(temp2, temp, np11);
01772                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp2, np22, temp2);
01773                 return dot_v3v3(temp2, temp2);
01774             }
01775         } 
01776         else 
01777         { // == 0.0
01778             *out_a1 = projectPointOntoLine(np21, np11, np12);
01779             if ((*out_a1 >= -FLT_EPSILON) && (*out_a1 <= 1.0 + FLT_EPSILON)) 
01780             {
01781                 calculateEENormal(np11, np11, np21, np22, out_normal);
01782 
01783                 // return (np21 - (np11 + (np12 - np11) * out_a1)).lengthSquared();
01784                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np11);
01785                 mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a1);
01786                 VECADD(temp2, temp, np11);
01787                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp2, np21, temp2);
01788                 return dot_v3v3(temp2, temp2);
01789             }
01790         }
01791 
01792         CLAMP(*out_a1, 0.0, 1.0);
01793         calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01794         if (*out_a1 > .5)
01795         {
01796             if (*out_a2 > .5)
01797             {
01798                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np22);
01799             }
01800             else
01801             {
01802                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np21);
01803             }
01804         }
01805         else
01806         {
01807             if (*out_a2 > .5)
01808             {
01809                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np11, np22);
01810             }
01811             else
01812             {
01813                 sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np11, np21);
01814             }
01815         }
01816 
01817         return dot_v3v3(temp, temp);
01818     }
01819     else
01820     {
01821         
01822         // If the lines aren't parallel (but coplanar) they have to intersect
01823 
01824         findClosestPointsEE(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_a1, out_a2);
01825 
01826         // If both points are on the finite edges, we're done.
01827         if (*out_a1 >= 0.0 && *out_a1 <= 1.0 && *out_a2 >= 0.0 && *out_a2 <= 1.0) 
01828         {
01829             float p1[3], p2[3];
01830             
01831             // p1= np11 + (np12 - np11) * out_a1;
01832             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np11);
01833             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a1);
01834             VECADD(p1, np11, temp);
01835             
01836             // p2 = np21 + (np22 - np21) * out_a2;
01837             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np22, np21);
01838             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a2);
01839             VECADD(p2, np21, temp);
01840 
01841             calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01842             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, p1, p2);
01843             return dot_v3v3(temp, temp);
01844         }
01845 
01846         
01847         /*
01848         * Clamp both points to the finite edges.
01849         * The one that moves most during clamping is one part of the solution.
01850         */
01851         dist_a1 = *out_a1;
01852         CLAMP(dist_a1, 0.0, 1.0);
01853         dist_a2 = *out_a2;
01854         CLAMP(dist_a2, 0.0, 1.0);
01855 
01856         // Now project the "most clamped" point on the other line.
01857         if (dist_a1 > dist_a2) 
01858         { 
01859             /* keep out_a1 */
01860             float p1[3];
01861 
01862             // p1 = np11 + (np12 - np11) * out_a1;
01863             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np11);
01864             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a1);
01865             VECADD(p1, np11, temp);
01866 
01867             *out_a2 = projectPointOntoLine(p1, np21, np22);
01868             CLAMP(*out_a2, 0.0, 1.0);
01869 
01870             calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01871 
01872             // return (p1 - (np21 + (np22 - np21) * out_a2)).lengthSquared();
01873             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np22, np21);
01874             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a2);
01875             VECADD(temp, temp, np21);
01876             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, p1, temp);
01877             return dot_v3v3(temp, temp);
01878         } 
01879         else 
01880         {   
01881             /* keep out_a2 */
01882             float p2[3];
01883             
01884             // p2 = np21 + (np22 - np21) * out_a2;
01885             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np22, np21);
01886             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a2);
01887             VECADD(p2, np21, temp);
01888 
01889             *out_a1 = projectPointOntoLine(p2, np11, np12);
01890             CLAMP(*out_a1, 0.0, 1.0);
01891 
01892             calculateEENormal(np11, np12, np21, np22, out_normal);
01893             
01894             // return ((np11 + (np12 - np11) * out_a1) - p2).lengthSquared();
01895             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, np12, np11);
01896             mul_v3_fl(temp, *out_a1);
01897             VECADD(temp, temp, np11);
01898             sub_v3_v3v3(temp, temp, p2);
01899             return dot_v3v3(temp, temp);
01900         }
01901     }
01902     
01903     printf("Error in edgedge_distance: end of function\n");
01904     return 0;
01905 }
01906 
01907 static int cloth_collision_moving_edges ( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair )
01908 {
01909     EdgeCollPair edgecollpair;
01910     Cloth *cloth1=NULL;
01911     ClothVertex *verts1=NULL;
01912     unsigned int i = 0, k = 0;
01913     int numsolutions = 0;
01914     double x1[3], v1[3], x2[3], v2[3], x3[3], v3[3];
01915     double solution[3], solution2[3];
01916     MVert *verts2 = collmd->current_x; // old x
01917     MVert *velocity2 = collmd->current_v; // velocity
01918     float distance = 0;
01919     float triA[3][3], triB[3][3];
01920     int result = 0;
01921 
01922     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
01923     verts1 = cloth1->verts;
01924 
01925     for (i = 0; i < 9; i++)
01926     {
01927         // 9 edge - edge possibilities
01928 
01929         if (i == 0) // cloth edge: 1-2; coll edge: 1-2
01930         {
01931             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01932             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap2;
01933 
01934             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01935             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp2;
01936         }
01937         else if (i == 1) // cloth edge: 1-2; coll edge: 2-3
01938         {
01939             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01940             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap2;
01941 
01942             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp2;
01943             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
01944         }
01945         else if (i == 2) // cloth edge: 1-2; coll edge: 1-3
01946         {
01947             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01948             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap2;
01949 
01950             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01951             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
01952         }
01953         else if (i == 3) // cloth edge: 2-3; coll edge: 1-2
01954         {
01955             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap2;
01956             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01957 
01958             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01959             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp2;
01960         }
01961         else if (i == 4) // cloth edge: 2-3; coll edge: 2-3
01962         {
01963             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap2;
01964             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01965 
01966             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp2;
01967             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
01968         }
01969         else if (i == 5) // cloth edge: 2-3; coll edge: 1-3
01970         {
01971             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap2;
01972             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01973 
01974             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01975             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
01976         }
01977         else if (i ==6) // cloth edge: 1-3; coll edge: 1-2
01978         {
01979             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01980             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01981 
01982             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01983             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp2;
01984         }
01985         else if (i ==7) // cloth edge: 1-3; coll edge: 2-3
01986         {
01987             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01988             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01989 
01990             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp2;
01991             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
01992         }
01993         else if (i == 8) // cloth edge: 1-3; coll edge: 1-3
01994         {
01995             edgecollpair.p11 = collpair->ap1;
01996             edgecollpair.p12 = collpair->ap3;
01997 
01998             edgecollpair.p21 = collpair->bp1;
01999             edgecollpair.p22 = collpair->bp3;
02000         }
02001         /*
02002         if ((edgecollpair.p11 == 3) && (edgecollpair.p12 == 16))
02003             printf("Ahier!\n");
02004         if ((edgecollpair.p11 == 16) && (edgecollpair.p12 == 3))
02005             printf("Ahier!\n");
02006         */
02007 
02008         // if ( !cloth_are_edges_adjacent ( clmd, collmd, &edgecollpair ) )
02009         {
02010             // always put coll points in p21/p22
02011             sub_v3_v3v3 ( x1, verts1[edgecollpair.p12].txold, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].txold );
02012             sub_v3_v3v3 ( v1, verts1[edgecollpair.p12].tv, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].tv );
02013 
02014             sub_v3_v3v3 ( x2, verts2[edgecollpair.p21].co, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].txold );
02015             sub_v3_v3v3 ( v2, velocity2[edgecollpair.p21].co, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].tv );
02016 
02017             sub_v3_v3v3 ( x3, verts2[edgecollpair.p22].co, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].txold );
02018             sub_v3_v3v3 ( v3, velocity2[edgecollpair.p22].co, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].tv );
02019 
02020             numsolutions = cloth_get_collision_time ( x1, v1, x2, v2, x3, v3, solution );
02021 
02022             if ((edgecollpair.p11 == 3 && edgecollpair.p12==16)|| (edgecollpair.p11==16 && edgecollpair.p12==3))
02023             {
02024                 if (edgecollpair.p21==6 || edgecollpair.p22 == 6)
02025                 {
02026                     printf("dist: %f, sol[k]: %f, sol2[k]: %f\n", distance, solution[k], solution2[k]);
02027                     printf("a1: %f, a2: %f, b1: %f, b2: %f\n", x1[0], x2[0], x3[0], v1[0]);
02028                     printf("b21: %d, b22: %d\n", edgecollpair.p21, edgecollpair.p22);
02029                 }
02030             }
02031 
02032             for ( k = 0; k < numsolutions; k++ )
02033             {
02034                 // printf("sol %d: %lf\n", k, solution[k]);
02035                 if ( ( solution[k] >= ALMOST_ZERO ) && ( solution[k] <= 1.0 ) && ( solution[k] >  ALMOST_ZERO))
02036                 {
02037                     float a,b;
02038                     float out_normal[3];
02039                     float distance;
02040                     float impulse = 0;
02041                     float I_mag;
02042 
02043                     // move verts
02044                     VECADDS(triA[0], verts1[edgecollpair.p11].txold, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].tv, solution[k]);
02045                     VECADDS(triA[1], verts1[edgecollpair.p12].txold, verts1[edgecollpair.p12].tv, solution[k]);
02046 
02047                     VECADDS(triB[0], collmd->current_x[edgecollpair.p21].co, collmd->current_v[edgecollpair.p21].co, solution[k]);
02048                     VECADDS(triB[1], collmd->current_x[edgecollpair.p22].co, collmd->current_v[edgecollpair.p22].co, solution[k]);
02049 
02050                     // TODO: check for collisions
02051                     distance = edgedge_distance(triA[0], triA[1], triB[0], triB[1], &a, &b, out_normal);
02052                     
02053                     if ((distance <= clmd->coll_parms->epsilon + BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree ) + ALMOST_ZERO) && (dot_v3v3(out_normal, out_normal) > 0))
02054                     {
02055                         float vrel_1_to_2[3], temp[3], temp2[3], out_normalVelocity;
02056                         float desiredVn;
02057 
02058                         copy_v3_v3(vrel_1_to_2, verts1[edgecollpair.p11].tv);
02059                         mul_v3_fl(vrel_1_to_2, 1.0 - a);
02060                         copy_v3_v3(temp, verts1[edgecollpair.p12].tv);
02061                         mul_v3_fl(temp, a);
02062 
02063                         VECADD(vrel_1_to_2, vrel_1_to_2, temp);
02064 
02065                         copy_v3_v3(temp, verts1[edgecollpair.p21].tv);
02066                         mul_v3_fl(temp, 1.0 - b);
02067                         copy_v3_v3(temp2, verts1[edgecollpair.p22].tv);
02068                         mul_v3_fl(temp2, b);
02069                         VECADD(temp, temp, temp2);
02070 
02071                         sub_v3_v3v3(vrel_1_to_2, vrel_1_to_2, temp);
02072 
02073                         out_normalVelocity = dot_v3v3(vrel_1_to_2, out_normal);
02074 /*
02075                         // this correction results in wrong normals sometimes?
02076                         if (out_normalVelocity < 0.0)
02077                         {
02078                             out_normalVelocity*= -1.0;
02079                             negate_v3(out_normal);
02080                         }
02081 */
02082                         /* Inelastic repulsion impulse. */
02083 
02084                         // Calculate which normal velocity we need. 
02085                         desiredVn = (out_normalVelocity * (float)solution[k] - (.1 * (clmd->coll_parms->epsilon + BLI_bvhtree_getepsilon ( collmd->bvhtree )) - sqrt(distance)) - ALMOST_ZERO);
02086 
02087                         // Now calculate what impulse we need to reach that velocity. 
02088                         I_mag = (out_normalVelocity - desiredVn) / 2.0; // / (1/m1 + 1/m2);
02089 
02090                         // Finally apply that impulse. 
02091                         impulse = (2.0 * -I_mag) / (a*a + (1.0-a)*(1.0-a) + b*b + (1.0-b)*(1.0-b));
02092 
02093                         VECADDMUL ( verts1[edgecollpair.p11].impulse, out_normal, (1.0-a) * impulse );
02094                         verts1[edgecollpair.p11].impulse_count++;
02095 
02096                         VECADDMUL ( verts1[edgecollpair.p12].impulse, out_normal, a * impulse );
02097                         verts1[edgecollpair.p12].impulse_count++;
02098 
02099                         // return true;
02100                         result = 1;
02101                         break;
02102                     }
02103                     else
02104                     {
02105                         // missing from collision.hpp
02106                     }
02107                     // mintime = MIN2(mintime, (float)solution[k]);
02108 
02109                     break;
02110                 }
02111             }
02112         }
02113     }
02114     return result;
02115 }
02116 
02117 static int cloth_collision_moving ( ClothModifierData *clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collpair, CollPair *collision_end )
02118 {
02119     Cloth *cloth1;
02120     cloth1 = clmd->clothObject;
02121 
02122     for ( ; collpair != collision_end; collpair++ )
02123     {
02124         // only handle moving collisions here
02125         if (!( collpair->flag & COLLISION_IN_FUTURE ))
02126             continue;
02127 
02128         cloth_collision_moving_edges ( clmd, collmd, collpair);
02129         // cloth_collision_moving_tris ( clmd, collmd, collpair);
02130     }
02131 
02132     return 1;
02133 }
02134 #endif
02135 
02136 static void add_collision_object(Object ***objs, unsigned int *numobj, unsigned int *maxobj, Object *ob, Object *self, int level, unsigned int modifier_type)
02137 {
02138     CollisionModifierData *cmd= NULL;
02139 
02140     if (ob == self)
02141         return;
02142 
02143     /* only get objects with collision modifier */
02144     if (((modifier_type == eModifierType_Collision) && ob->pd && ob->pd->deflect) || (modifier_type != eModifierType_Collision))
02145         cmd= (CollisionModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(ob, modifier_type);
02146     
02147     if (cmd) {  
02148         /* extend array */
02149         if (*numobj >= *maxobj) {
02150             *maxobj *= 2;
02151             *objs= MEM_reallocN(*objs, sizeof(Object*)*(*maxobj));
02152         }
02153         
02154         (*objs)[*numobj] = ob;
02155         (*numobj)++;
02156     }
02157 
02158     /* objects in dupli groups, one level only for now */
02159     if (ob->dup_group && level == 0) {
02160         GroupObject *go;
02161         Group *group= ob->dup_group;
02162 
02163         /* add objects */
02164         for (go= group->gobject.first; go; go= go->next)
02165             add_collision_object(objs, numobj, maxobj, go->ob, self, level+1, modifier_type);
02166     }   
02167 }
02168 
02169 // return all collision objects in scene
02170 // collision object will exclude self 
02171 Object **get_collisionobjects(Scene *scene, Object *self, Group *group, unsigned int *numcollobj, unsigned int modifier_type)
02172 {
02173     Base *base;
02174     Object **objs;
02175     GroupObject *go;
02176     unsigned int numobj= 0, maxobj= 100;
02177     
02178     objs= MEM_callocN(sizeof(Object *)*maxobj, "CollisionObjectsArray");
02179 
02180     /* gather all collision objects */
02181     if (group) {
02182         /* use specified group */
02183         for (go= group->gobject.first; go; go= go->next)
02184             add_collision_object(&objs, &numobj, &maxobj, go->ob, self, 0, modifier_type);
02185     }
02186     else {
02187         Scene *sce_iter;
02188         /* add objects in same layer in scene */
02189         for (SETLOOPER(scene, sce_iter, base)) {
02190             if (base->lay & self->lay)
02191                 add_collision_object(&objs, &numobj, &maxobj, base->object, self, 0, modifier_type);
02192 
02193         }
02194     }
02195 
02196     *numcollobj= numobj;
02197 
02198     return objs;
02199 }
02200 
02201 static void add_collider_cache_object(ListBase **objs, Object *ob, Object *self, int level)
02202 {
02203     CollisionModifierData *cmd= NULL;
02204     ColliderCache *col;
02205 
02206     if (ob == self)
02207         return;
02208 
02209     if (ob->pd && ob->pd->deflect)
02210         cmd =(CollisionModifierData *)modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Collision);
02211     
02212     if (cmd && cmd->bvhtree) {  
02213         if (*objs == NULL)
02214             *objs = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ListBase), "ColliderCache array");
02215 
02216         col = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ColliderCache), "ColliderCache");
02217         col->ob = ob;
02218         col->collmd = cmd;
02219         /* make sure collider is properly set up */
02220         collision_move_object(cmd, 1.0, 0.0);
02221         BLI_addtail(*objs, col);
02222     }
02223 
02224     /* objects in dupli groups, one level only for now */
02225     if (ob->dup_group && level == 0) {
02226         GroupObject *go;
02227         Group *group= ob->dup_group;
02228 
02229         /* add objects */
02230         for (go= group->gobject.first; go; go= go->next)
02231             add_collider_cache_object(objs, go->ob, self, level+1);
02232     }
02233 }
02234 
02235 ListBase *get_collider_cache(Scene *scene, Object *self, Group *group)
02236 {
02237     GroupObject *go;
02238     ListBase *objs= NULL;
02239     
02240     /* add object in same layer in scene */
02241     if (group) {
02242         for (go= group->gobject.first; go; go= go->next)
02243             add_collider_cache_object(&objs, go->ob, self, 0);
02244     }
02245     else {
02246         Scene *sce_iter;
02247         Base *base;
02248 
02249         /* add objects in same layer in scene */
02250         for (SETLOOPER(scene, sce_iter, base)) {
02251             if (!self || (base->lay & self->lay))
02252                 add_collider_cache_object(&objs, base->object, self, 0);
02253 
02254         }
02255     }
02256 
02257     return objs;
02258 }
02259 
02260 void free_collider_cache(ListBase **colliders)
02261 {
02262     if (*colliders) {
02263         BLI_freelistN(*colliders);
02264         MEM_freeN(*colliders);
02265         *colliders = NULL;
02266     }
02267 }
