02269 
02270 static void cloth_bvh_objcollisions_nearcheck ( ClothModifierData * clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd,
02271     CollPair **collisions, CollPair **collisions_index, int numresult, BVHTreeOverlap *overlap, double dt)
02272 {
02273     int i;
02274 #ifdef WITH_ELTOPO
02275     GHash *visithash = BLI_ghash_new(edgepair_hash, edgepair_cmp, "visthash, collision.c");
02276     GHash *tri_visithash = BLI_ghash_new(tripair_hash, tripair_cmp, "tri_visthash, collision.c");
02277     MemArena *arena = BLI_memarena_new(1<<16, "edge hash arena, collision.c");
02278 #endif
02279     
02280     *collisions = ( CollPair* ) MEM_mallocN ( sizeof ( CollPair ) * numresult * 64, "collision array" ); //*4 since cloth_collision_static can return more than 1 collision
02281     *collisions_index = *collisions;
02282     
02283 #ifdef WITH_ELTOPO
02284     machine_epsilon_offset(clmd->clothObject);
02285 
02286     for ( i = 0; i < numresult; i++ )
02287     {
02288         *collisions_index = cloth_collision ( (ModifierData *)clmd, (ModifierData *)collmd,
02289                                               overlap+i, *collisions_index, dt, tri_visithash, arena );
02290     }
02291 
02292     for ( i = 0; i < numresult; i++ )
02293     {
02294         *collisions_index = cloth_edge_collision ( (ModifierData *)clmd, (ModifierData *)collmd,
02295                                                    overlap+i, *collisions_index, visithash, arena );
02296     }
02297     BLI_ghash_free(visithash, NULL, NULL);
02298     BLI_ghash_free(tri_visithash, NULL, NULL);
02299     BLI_memarena_free(arena);
02300 #else /* WITH_ELTOPO */
02301     for ( i = 0; i < numresult; i++ )
02302     {
02303         *collisions_index = cloth_collision ( (ModifierData *)clmd, (ModifierData *)collmd,
02304                                               overlap+i, *collisions_index, dt );
02305     }
02306 #endif /* WITH_ELTOPO */
02307 
02308 }
02309 
02310 static int cloth_bvh_objcollisions_resolve ( ClothModifierData * clmd, CollisionModifierData *collmd, CollPair *collisions, CollPair *collisions_index)
02311 {
02312     Cloth *cloth = clmd->clothObject;
02313     int i=0, j = 0, /*numfaces = 0,*/ numverts = 0;
02314     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
02315     int ret = 0;
02316     int result = 0;
02317     float tnull[3] = {0,0,0};
02318     
02319     /*numfaces = clmd->clothObject->numfaces;*/ /*UNUSED*/
02320     numverts = clmd->clothObject->numverts;
02321  
02322     verts = cloth->verts;
02323     
02324     // process all collisions (calculate impulses, TODO: also repulses if distance too short)
02325     result = 1;
02326     for ( j = 0; j < 5; j++ ) // 5 is just a value that ensures convergence
02327     {
02328         result = 0;
02329 
02330         if ( collmd->bvhtree )
02331         {
02332 #ifdef WITH_ELTOPO
02333             result += cloth_collision_response_moving(clmd, collmd, collisions, collisions_index);
02334             result += cloth_edge_collision_response_moving(clmd, collmd, collisions, collisions_index);
02335 #else
02336             result += cloth_collision_response_static ( clmd, collmd, collisions, collisions_index );
02337 #endif
02338 #ifdef WITH_ELTOPO
02339             {
02340 #else
02341             // apply impulses in parallel
02342             if ( result )
02343             {
02344 #endif
02345                 for ( i = 0; i < numverts; i++ )
02346                 {
02347                     // calculate "velocities" (just xnew = xold + v; no dt in v)
02348                     if ( verts[i].impulse_count )
02349                     {
02350                         VECADDMUL ( verts[i].tv, verts[i].impulse, 1.0f / verts[i].impulse_count );
02351                         copy_v3_v3 ( verts[i].impulse, tnull );
02352                         verts[i].impulse_count = 0;
02353 
02354                         ret++;
02355                     }
02356                 }
02357             }
02358         }
02359     }
02360     return ret;
02361 }
02362 
02363 // cloth - object collisions
02364 int cloth_bvh_objcollision (Object *ob, ClothModifierData * clmd, float step, float dt )
02365 {
02366     Cloth *cloth= clmd->clothObject;
02367     BVHTree *cloth_bvh= cloth->bvhtree;
02368     unsigned int i=0, /* numfaces = 0, */ /* UNUSED */ numverts = 0, k, l, j;
02369     int rounds = 0; // result counts applied collisions; ic is for debug output;
02370     ClothVertex *verts = NULL;
02371     int ret = 0, ret2 = 0;
02372     Object **collobjs = NULL;
02373     unsigned int numcollobj = 0;
02374 
02375     if ((clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_COLLOBJ) || cloth_bvh==NULL)
02376         return 0;
02377     
02378     verts = cloth->verts;
02379     /* numfaces = cloth->numfaces; */ /* UNUSED */
02380     numverts = cloth->numverts;
02381 
02383     // static collisions
02385 
02386     // update cloth bvh
02387     bvhtree_update_from_cloth ( clmd, 1 ); // 0 means STATIC, 1 means MOVING (see later in this function)
02388     bvhselftree_update_from_cloth ( clmd, 0 ); // 0 means STATIC, 1 means MOVING (see later in this function)
02389     
02390     collobjs = get_collisionobjects(clmd->scene, ob, clmd->coll_parms->group, &numcollobj, eModifierType_Collision);
02391     
02392     if (!collobjs)
02393         return 0;
02394 
02395     do
02396     {
02397         CollPair **collisions, **collisions_index;
02398         
02399         ret2 = 0;
02400 
02401         collisions = MEM_callocN(sizeof(CollPair *) *numcollobj , "CollPair");
02402         collisions_index = MEM_callocN(sizeof(CollPair *) *numcollobj , "CollPair");
02403         
02404         // check all collision objects
02405         for (i = 0; i < numcollobj; i++)
02406         {
02407             Object *collob= collobjs[i];
02408             CollisionModifierData *collmd = (CollisionModifierData*)modifiers_findByType(collob, eModifierType_Collision);
02409             BVHTreeOverlap *overlap = NULL;
02410             unsigned int result = 0;
02411             
02412             if (!collmd->bvhtree)
02413                 continue;
02414             
02415             /* move object to position (step) in time */
02416             
02417             collision_move_object ( collmd, step + dt, step );
02418             
02419             /* search for overlapping collision pairs */
02420             overlap = BLI_bvhtree_overlap ( cloth_bvh, collmd->bvhtree, &result );
02421                 
02422             // go to next object if no overlap is there
02423             if ( result && overlap ) {
02424                 /* check if collisions really happen (costly near check) */
02425                 cloth_bvh_objcollisions_nearcheck ( clmd, collmd, &collisions[i], 
02426                     &collisions_index[i], result, overlap, dt/(float)clmd->coll_parms->loop_count);
02427             
02428                 // resolve nearby collisions
02429                 ret += cloth_bvh_objcollisions_resolve ( clmd, collmd, collisions[i],  collisions_index[i]);
02430                 ret2 += ret;
02431             }
02432 
02433             if ( overlap )
02434                 MEM_freeN ( overlap );
02435         }
02436         rounds++;
02437         
02438         for (i = 0; i < numcollobj; i++)
02439         {
02440             if ( collisions[i] ) MEM_freeN ( collisions[i] );
02441         }
02442             
02443         MEM_freeN(collisions);
02444         MEM_freeN(collisions_index);
02445 
02447         // update positions
02448         // this is needed for bvh_calc_DOP_hull_moving() [kdop.c]
02450 
02451         // verts come from clmd
02452         for ( i = 0; i < numverts; i++ )
02453         {
02454             if ( clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL )
02455             {
02456                 if ( verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED )
02457                 {
02458                     continue;
02459                 }
02460             }
02461 
02462             VECADD ( verts[i].tx, verts[i].txold, verts[i].tv );
02463         }
02465         
02466         
02468         // Test on *simple* selfcollisions
02470         if ( clmd->coll_parms->flags & CLOTH_COLLSETTINGS_FLAG_SELF )
02471         {
02472             for (l = 0; l < (unsigned int)clmd->coll_parms->self_loop_count; l++)
02473             {
02474                 // TODO: add coll quality rounds again
02475                 BVHTreeOverlap *overlap = NULL;
02476                 unsigned int result = 0;
02477     
02478                 // collisions = 1;
02479                 verts = cloth->verts; // needed for openMP
02480     
02481                 /* numfaces = cloth->numfaces; */ /* UNUSED */
02482                 numverts = cloth->numverts;
02483     
02484                 verts = cloth->verts;
02485     
02486                 if ( cloth->bvhselftree )
02487                 {
02488                     // search for overlapping collision pairs 
02489                     overlap = BLI_bvhtree_overlap ( cloth->bvhselftree, cloth->bvhselftree, &result );
02490     
02491     // #pragma omp parallel for private(k, i, j) schedule(static)
02492                     for ( k = 0; k < result; k++ )
02493                     {
02494                         float temp[3];
02495                         float length = 0;
02496                         float mindistance;
02497     
02498                         i = overlap[k].indexA;
02499                         j = overlap[k].indexB;
02500     
02501                         mindistance = clmd->coll_parms->selfepsilon* ( cloth->verts[i].avg_spring_len + cloth->verts[j].avg_spring_len );
02502     
02503                         if ( clmd->sim_parms->flags & CLOTH_SIMSETTINGS_FLAG_GOAL )
02504                         {
02505                             if ( ( cloth->verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED ) &&
02506                                  ( cloth->verts [j].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED ) )
02507                             {
02508                                 continue;
02509                             }
02510                         }
02511     
02512                         sub_v3_v3v3 ( temp, verts[i].tx, verts[j].tx );
02513     
02514                         if ( ( ABS ( temp[0] ) > mindistance ) || ( ABS ( temp[1] ) > mindistance ) || ( ABS ( temp[2] ) > mindistance ) ) continue;
02515     
02516                         // check for adjacent points (i must be smaller j)
02517                         if ( BLI_edgehash_haskey ( cloth->edgehash, MIN2(i, j), MAX2(i, j) ) )
02518                         {
02519                             continue;
02520                         }
02521     
02522                         length = normalize_v3( temp );
02523     
02524                         if ( length < mindistance )
02525                         {
02526                             float correction = mindistance - length;
02527     
02528                             if ( cloth->verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED )
02529                             {
02530                                 mul_v3_fl( temp, -correction );
02531                                 VECADD ( verts[j].tx, verts[j].tx, temp );
02532                             }
02533                             else if ( cloth->verts [j].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED )
02534                             {
02535                                 mul_v3_fl( temp, correction );
02536                                 VECADD ( verts[i].tx, verts[i].tx, temp );
02537                             }
02538                             else
02539                             {
02540                                 mul_v3_fl( temp, correction * -0.5 );
02541                                 VECADD ( verts[j].tx, verts[j].tx, temp );
02542     
02543                                 sub_v3_v3v3 ( verts[i].tx, verts[i].tx, temp );
02544                             }
02545                             ret = 1;
02546                             ret2 += ret;
02547                         }
02548                         else {
02549                             // check for approximated time collisions
02550                         }
02551                     }
02552     
02553                     if ( overlap )
02554                         MEM_freeN ( overlap );
02555     
02556                 }
02557             }
02559 
02561             // SELFCOLLISIONS: update velocities
02563             if ( ret2 )
02564             {
02565                 for ( i = 0; i < cloth->numverts; i++ )
02566                 {
02567                     if ( ! ( verts [i].flags & CLOTH_VERT_FLAG_PINNED ) )
02568                     {
02569                         sub_v3_v3v3 ( verts[i].tv, verts[i].tx, verts[i].txold );
02570                     }
02571                 }
02572             }
02574         }
02575     }
02576     while ( ret2 && ( clmd->coll_parms->loop_count>rounds ) );
02577     
02578     if (collobjs)
02579         MEM_freeN(collobjs);
02580 
02581     return 1|MIN2 ( ret, 1 );
02582 }
